title: Folding Spoon, ca. 1700–10
dimensions:
L x W (open): 18 x 4 cm (7 1/16 x 1 9/16 in.)
L (closed): 10 cm (3 15/16 in.)
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Oval-shaped rattail spoonbowl. Flat, slightly curved neck with hinge and small sliding sleeve. Flat handle with trifid end. Engraved with v-shaped pattern at the front and back of neck. The handle is engraved on both sides with stylized leaves and fruits. The bowl bends forward.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Folding Spoon, ca. 1700–10.
ca. 1700–10. Brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-262.
